title: Episode 68: SkillShare
description: This week on Let’s Eat In, Cathy is joined by Michael Karnjanaprakorn, the founder of SkillShare.com – a community marketplace to learn anything from anyone. Michael and Cathy talk about how attending small underground classes can help you figure out what your true calling is. This episode was sponsored by Hearst Ranch – the nations largest single-source supplier of grassfed and grass-finished beef. For more information visit
author: info@heritageradionetwork.org (Heritage Radio Network)
